mapper.update: update member_info set mb_auth = #{mb_auth}, mb_reason = #{mb_reason} where mb_num = #{mb_num}
mapper.select: select info.*, p.pro_img from (select l.ml_num, l.id, i.mb_name, i.mb_nickname, i.mb_about, i.pro_num from allchwi.member_login l, allchwi.member_info i where l.ml_num = i.ml_num) info, allchwi.profile_img p where info.pro_num = p.pro_num and ml_num = #{ml_num};
